title: Skelet #17 and the fifth Busy Beaver number
abstract:
We prove nonhalting of the Turing machine dubbed "Skelet #17", known to be
one of the toughest 5-state, 2-symbol Turing machines to analyze. Combined with
the efforts of The Busy Beaver Challenge, we are therefore able to show that
BB(5), the fifth Busy Beaver number, equals 47,176,870.
